entries.abort: Our cover is blown. We'll never make it!
entries.arrived_at_loc: That's the correct coordinates pilot. Wait for the transport to come out of hiding.
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Incoming fighter vessels. Scans show weapons armed. >
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.complete: Good job pilot, they are safe. Return to base.
entries.failed_destroy: We can't afford to loose transports like that pilot! Return to base, you have some explaining to do!
entries.failed_protect: What happened up there pilot?!  Return to base, you have some explaining to do!
entries.found_loc: Proceed to these coordinates immediately pilot, we have found the transport!
entries.goodbye_1: Alright, we can take things from here.
entries.goodbye_2: Alright, we can take things from here.
entries.goodbye_3: Alright, we can take things from here.
entries.goodbye_4: Alright, we can take things from here.
entries.goodbye_5: Alright, we can take things from here.
entries.hull_half: I didn't think this ship could get in a worse state, I was wrong!
entries.panic_2: Darn! TIE fighters coming toward us!
entries.panic_3: I wish this piece of junk had some fighting abilities!
entries.panic_4: We're in your hands pilot, here they come!
entries.panic_5: I hope you know what you're doing, this will get ugly!
entries.quest_escort_d: Follow the Alliance transport as it makes its way through the Corellia system. Defend it against any hostile forces that attack. Ensure that the transport reaches its hyperspace jump-point safely.
entries.quest_location_d: Fly to the navigation point and meet up with the Alliance transport.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: Fly to this nav point and wait for the Alliance transport to come out of hyperspace.
entries.reason_1: Good to see you pilot, our ship is having all sorts of problems. We won't be able to go fast so we need your protection.
entries.reason_2: Good to see you pilot, our ship is having all sorts of problems. We won't be able to go fast so we need your protection.
entries.reason_3: Good to see you pilot, our ship is having all sorts of problems. We won't be able to go fast so we need your protection.
entries.reason_4: Good to see you pilot, our ship is having all sorts of problems. We won't be able to go fast so we need your protection.
entries.reason_5: Good to see you pilot, our ship is having all sorts of problems. We won't be able to go fast so we need your protection.
entries.shields_depleted: Our shields just went down! I hate this ship!
entries.split_quest_alert: Rebel Command: < There's another freighter that need your help pilot, don't let us down again! >
entries.taunt_1: Cut your engines immediately and no one will be harmed!
entries.taunt_2: You are transporting illegal material, surrender!
entries.taunt_3: There's no way we will let you get away Rebel!
entries.taunt_4: Just face it Rebels, there's no way out of here alive!
entries.taunt_5: You just made my day Rebel scum, finally some action!
entries.thanks_2: Good, now lets get out of here!
entries.thanks_3: I'm not sure this piece of junk can take another attack like that...
entries.thanks_5: I thought we were done for, thanks pilot!
entries.title: Corellia system: Escort the Transport to Safety.
entries.title_d: Escort the Transport to Safety. A waypoint should appear, when you reach it a transport will come out of hiding momentarily. Follow it and ensure its safety from any enemy threats.
